<title level="1" right="Hazard 8" pfs="">[Insistent Privacy Fence](/Hazards.aspx?ID=96)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 81</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A stretch of fence is electrified by a hidden Stasian coil.

---

**Stealth**
DC 30 (expert)

**Disable**
[Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) DC 28 (expert) to carefully disconnect the coil from the fence or [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) DC 30 (master) to jury-rig a grounding device to nullify the shock

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 25, **Fort** +20, **Ref** +14

**Hardness**
15

**HP**
60 (BT 30)

**Immunities**
object immunities

</column>

**Shock** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature touches the fence directly or with a tool or weapon; **Effect** The fence deals 7d12 electricity damage to the triggering creature (DC 26 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

---
**Reset**
The trap deactivates and resets after 1 minute.
name: Insistent Privacy Fence
